item.title: 393 Hard Rock &Metal Bands Ranked By Their Spotify Listeners For October
item.dc:creator: Corinne Westbrook
item.description:
October wasn 't the greatest month for rock and heavy metal. Despite some bands seeing large gains in their following, overall listenership only grew by 0.85%. The biggest gains in new listeners were: Employed To Serve: +90.17%Ice Nine Kills: +68.46%Architects: +54.68%Within the Ruins: +50.84The Unguided: +45.89% And, while we did see an overall increase, some bands […]

The post 393 Hard Rock & Metal Bands Ranked By Their Spotify Listeners For October appeared first on Metal Injection .

item.title: German Study Reveals "Low to Very Low" Risk of COVID-19 Spread At Indoor Gigs, If Proper Safety Precautions Are Met
item.dc:creator: Robert Pasbani
item.description:
In August, we reported of a German study where 1,500 people gathered in the city of Leipzig for a live performance from singer-songwriter Tim Bendzko. Fans in attendance were given respiratory face masks, fluorescent hand gel and "contract tracker " transmitters, which "determine the contact rates and contact distances of the individual experiment participants." Well, the […]

The post German Study Reveals "Low to Very Low " Risk of COVID-19 Spread At Indoor Gigs, If Proper Safety Precautions Are Met appeared first on Metal Injection .

item.title: An Intrusion May Be The Most Metal Film of Next Year
item.dc:creator: Max Morin
item.description:
Everyone knows horror is the most metal movie genre. Demons, ghosts, dark forces, blood and gore. What’s not to like? Home invasion movies like An Intrusion take a different route. Here, the horror is subtle, building, and usually committed by human beings instead of hellish ghouls. So how did An Intrusion end up looking like […]

The post <em >An Intrusion </em > May Be The Most Metal Film of Next Year appeared first on Metal Injection .

item.title: Encounter Some Emotion In Your Death Metal With WINTER NIGHTS New Song "Withdrawals"
item.dc:creator: Aaron Price
item.description:
It 's time for some good old fashioned death metal. Winter Nights are ready to unveil their latest single and lyric video for the final track off their most recent self-titled album. The track, "Withdrawals ", tops off a 30 minute death metal album with a bang. "Withdrawals " is a track filled with somber and progressive lyrics […]

item.title: Album Review: WOMBRIPPER Macabre Melodies
item.dc:creator: Kevin Stewart-Panko
item.description:
Within the walls of the Stewart-Panko abode, mentioning the name Wombripper will elicit wildly differing reactions. My long-suffering wife works as a midwife, childbirth educator, consultant, counselor, and a bunch of other real job/real world stuff that applies to birthin’ babies and not to metal in the slightest. Thusly, you can imagine the death glares […]

item.title: An Incredible Journey With WIND ROSE on "We Were Warriors"
item.dc:creator: Corinne Westbrook
item.description:
There is no other way to describe this band other than "Tolkien Metal." This is metal fit for dwarves, elves and invading Mordor. They have perfected their mixture of heroic steel and folky, mead-drenched anthems. On this latest release they 've added an extra element of orchestra perfect for the great halls of Moria and honoring […]

The post An Incredible Journey With WIND ROSE on "We Were Warriors "appeared first on Metal Injection .

We learned about her new music video, "Antifa Niece," her opinion on Miley Cyrus, took some calls […]

The post METAL INJECTION LIVECAST #592 – Hexagonal Face with special guest Mrs. Smith appeared first on Metal Injection .
item.itunes:subtitle: On this election night edition, we are joined by the queen of shred herself, Mrs. Smith for the episode. Mrs. Smith updates us on her wah-off with Kirk Hammett, and shares some lovely stories about the Metallica guitarist.
item.itunes:summary:
On this election night edition, we are joined by the queen of shred herself, Mrs. Smith for the episode. Mrs. Smith updates us on her wah-off with Kirk Hammett, and shares some lovely stories about the Metallica guitarist. We learned about her new music video, "Antifa Niece," her opinion on Miley Cyrus, took some calls from fans and were amazed by her music improv skills. We also spent some time learning about David Hasselhoff's metal band. Throughout the episode, we dip in and out of election talk and check in with tallies as the show progresses.







Due to the special nature of this episode, we are unlocking the video version for all listeners:









Join our Patreon and get a bonus episode each month, and other behind the scenes goodies. More info here.



We are bringing back an old favorite with a twist, the music break – now as a Spotify playlist to listen to whenever you want. Make sure to follow the playlist. This week's tracks are:Oranssi Pazuzu – Uusi TeknokratiaLauren Babic –  ToxicFaith No More – We Care A LotDead Kennedys – Your Emotions







Listen to the Metal Injection Livecast on: Spotify, iTunes,Stitcher, Google Play, Tunein or this RSS feed.Follow us on: Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Youtube and our Discord Chat



Please help support the show and pick up a brand new t-shirt. Click below for all the choices:
